title: Sup GD, how the hell is your morning? Here's another Pok√©mon Go post
body:
I left for work early and stopped at a nice farming spot for Pokémon Go. There were a lot of families playing with their kids and then this cutie popped up and everybody started splitting up and searching for her. 

I'm pretty damn happy I got her because Vulpix is one of my favorites. 

So my day has been freaking great so far.
